page.title: 13BIOGRAPHY-FOOTBALLERS
page.content: After leaving school at 18 with some "o" levels and "A" levels hopefully tucked under my arm I hope to become a pro-footballer.After playing with Altofts A.F.C. since I was 11,I hope to have had some scouts to come and whatch me play and hopefully be signed on by somebody.I will probably get a part-time job for a while until I get some money which I will buy a semi-detached house with.I might get married at 25 and probably have children. I would like to go on holiday abroad e.g. Spain, Italy and Canada. The average wage for those who are fortunate enough to be employed is about Â£120 per week,where as a footballer may earn 5 times as much. by Andrew Clarke (age 13).
